name: Space & Tactics
description:
Summary

In the depths of space, you and your space fleet encounter enemy forces, and all sides activate their cloaking devices. Each fleet must strategically position their forces and manage their resources in order to destroy the enemy forces and escape alive.

The game is a battleships style game with a resource system and multiple abilities. The resource system allows players to strategically destroy other player’s ships by utilizing both offensive and defensive abilities to make sure their ships are the last remaining.

Technical Requirements

System: Android Phone/Tablet

Input: Touch Controls/On-screen Buttons

The Team

Anthony Mitchell - Project Manager, Art, Designer, Animator

Cameron Shepherd - Art, Particle effects, Designer

Luc Holland - SFX/Audio, Designer

Rahil - Particle effects, SFX/audio, Designer

Ray Zhang - Designer, Ship concept art

James Bishara - Programmer
